definition: dream of golden millet/fig. illusions of wealth and power/pipe dream
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream

sentences.english: Her fond dreams were bedashed at last.
sentences.chinese: 她的黃粱美夢最後破滅了。

sentences.english: He wants to marry Jane, but we think it a fond dream.
sentences.chinese: 他想娶珍妮，可是我們認爲這是黃粱美夢。

sentences.english: You shouldn't be doing this to youself. This is just shitty pipe dreams.
sentences.chinese: 你最好別這樣想了，那不過是黃粱美夢。
